scripts.minor: npx tailwindcss build ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/output.css && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: npx tailwindcss build ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/output.css && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.patch: npx tailwindcss build ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/output.css && npm version patch && npm publish
